author: Simon Difford
description: Ginger fuels this riff on the classic RAC Cocktail with sage and citrus notes from the gin being this cocktail's driving force (or engine).
name: Rapid Automobile Cocktail (RAC)
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Martini Rubino Riserva Speciale vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
